analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/22/0xb38aba0cffd116a05043ab825c8ebbf92008adf9.sol:
	Contract NSCToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/22/0xb38aba0cffd116a05043ab825c8ebbf92008adf9.sol#206-207)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/22/0xb38aba0cffd116a05043ab825c8ebbf92008adf9.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/22/0xb38aba0cffd116a05043ab825c8ebbf92008adf9.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/22/0xb38aba0cffd116a05043ab825c8ebbf92008adf9.sol#74-75) is not in mixedCase
